Hereâ€™s my New Yearâ€™s resolutions for this blog

  1. Fix this blog site
  2. Make regular posts
  3. Improve writing style
  4. Trick some people to reading. ;P

Iâ€™m not too keen with lists that need to end on even multiples. Who ever said that you only need to have 10 or 20 things on them. Iâ€™ll add more when I feel like it. So there. ðŸ˜€

Hereâ€™s my personal New Yearâ€™s resolutions (No particular order)

  1. Save more money, stay on the budget! Ouch.
  2. Exercise more. Reach my 130-pound goal. Iâ€™m at 154 pounds. Good luck to me! ðŸ™‚
  3. Read More. Finish those books I bought from 2 years ago.
  4. Pray more

  6. Get a new Bed.
  7. Work on a Schedule.
  8. Write more. Get a notebook. Luckily Karen gave me one of those Starbucks planners. (Better get a good pen)
  9. Compile my repository of scripts and scriptures.
  10. Go on vacation. Maybe abroad. (Fingers Crossed)
  11. Buy something important ðŸ˜‰ (for now Iâ€™ll keep this one a secret)

  15. Let go of my 10 year old work shirts.
  16. Braces

  18. Improve skills on GIMP or Adobe Photoshop (If I can afford a copy)
  19. Get married

Good luck to me and anyone with the tenacity to have a New Yearâ€™s Resolutions list! ðŸ™‚

Happy New Year!
